channel.title: How Do I Change A Ip On My Client
channel.description: Help I need to know how to change that server so that when u load it up and loggin it logins to that server Help please :confused:

item.title: How Do I Change A Ip On My Client
item.dc:creator: @WhiteWolves WhiteWolves
item.description:
@WhiteWolves wrote:

i have the same problem, but i want to change the ip name to something like this :www.google.com (exept not google but myweb)
i mean i’ve seen this for many servers.

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Change A Ip On My Client

item.title: How Do I Change A Ip On My Client
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

Open up the EGUI.java. There should be some IP’s there. Change them to the IP you want to connect to.

Also, search the client.java for that IP you saw in the EGUI.java. Change them to the IP you wish to connect to.

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Change A Ip On My Client

item.title: How Do I Change A Ip On My Client

item.description:
@_Ryan3 wrote:

Search for setServer or ServerIp in client.java

Read full topic
